DOC.brief_summary: Investigate how manipulating the time between caffeine ingestion and exercise may alter exercise performance and cognition
DOC.brief_title: How Does Altering the Timing of Pre-exercise Low-dose Caffeine Ingestion Affect Endurance Exercise Performance
DOC.criteria: vo2max > 55 ml/kg/min females on contraceptive pill recent skeletal muscle injury cardiovascular injury metabolic disease
